attributes.action:
Allow better treatment for endometriosis in the NHS.
.
attributes.additional_details: More treatment should be available instead of years of waiting lists to just be seen by a gynaecologist.
attributes.background: Stop women being treated so poorly. GP's, nurses, do not understand the full capacity if what endometriosis causes. Women are told to leave A&E as they just have "period pains " .it is shocking how we are mistreated and misdiagnosed due to a lack of understanding and knowledge of this disease.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702256
